bibl.title: Antinoopolis January / February and October 2011. Work in the Church D3 and in the Court Building of Dayr Sumbat.
bibl.note: 1. Operations in the church D3 (with reused ionic columns). - 2. Further activities in the court building of Dayr Sumbat.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Antinoopolis January / February and October 2011. Work in the Church D3 and in the Court Building of Dayr Sumbat.
Raccolta di scritti dedicati a Orsolina Montevecchi. III = Aegyptus 90 (2010 [2013]) pp. 183-205, 12 pll.
1. Operations in the church D3 (with reused ionic columns). - 2. Further activities in the court building of Dayr Sumbat.
